mapper.sql: bhss.ht_sample_standard_id, bhss.sample_standard_id, bhss.sample_standard_name, bhss.sample_standard_desc, bhss.`status`, bhss.remark, bhss.org_id, bhss.create_user_id, bhss.create_time, bhss.modified_user_id, bhss.modified_time, bhss.is_delete
mapper.select:
select , su.user_name AS create_user_name, sus.user_name AS modified_user_name, bo.organization_name FROM base_ht_sample_standard AS bhss LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON bhss.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user sus ON bhss.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN base_organization bo ON bhss.org_id = bo.organization_id
and date_format(bhss.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN date_format(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND date_format(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and bhss.sample_standard_name like CONCAT('%', #{sampleStandardName}, '%')
and bhss.sample_standard_desc like CONCAT('%', #{sampleStandardDesc}, '%')
and bhss.status=#{status}
and bhss.org_id=#{orgId}
order by bhss.modified_time desc
